overview:
Tristan Mace is an entrepreneur and digital strategist in New York.

He began creating campaigns at 14, then acquired by an Livney+Partners in high school. He led as creative director for the next five years until he started ParkerMace. Now 22, he is the the co-founder of Want Me Get Me, a website that upgrades modern travelers as VIP guests at the worldâ€™s top luxury and boutique hotels.

He was named a Young Global Travel Leader by PhoCusWright as a 35 under 35 and he is a member of Sandbox Network as a Global Changemaker Under 30. He received a degree in public relations from the University of Texas at Austin and regularly lectures on entrepreneurship, design and new media. He is obsessed with The Great Gatsby and believes in the infinite hope for the promises of life.

degrees.institution: The University of Texas at Austin
